alert.note: Alert for Barren; Hart (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:14PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hart and north central Barren Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 713 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Munfordville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Horse Cave, Cave City, Park City, Griderville, Glasgow Municipal Airport, Goodnight, Northtown, Highland Springs, and Legrande. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, seek shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for south central and central Kentucky.
